locales.description: Post label. Posts labeled "Misgendering & Deadnaming" demonstrate a lack of respect for a trans person's identity in the vein of misgendering, degendering, and deadnaming. This is exclusively for behavior that appears to be intentional. Repetitious or severe acts of disrespect likely entail other labels.
locales.name: Misgendering & Deadnaming

locales.description: Post/account label. Posts labeled "Transphobia (General)" demonstrate a generally transphobic stance. Repetitious or severe general transphobia likely entails an account label.
locales.name: Transphobia (General)

locales.description: Post/account label. Posts labeled "Transmisogyny" demonstrate a transmisogynistic stance. Repetitious or severe transmisogyny likely entails an account label.
locales.name: Transmisogyny

locales.description: Post/account label. Posts labeled "Enbyphobia" demonstrate an enbyphobic stance, which also includes transmedicalism and intersexism. Repetitious or severe enbyphobia likely entails an account label.
locales.name: Enbyphobia
